Song.title: Your Beauty And Your Majesty
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Jonathan and Ryan Baird © 2002 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| Dm F2 | C2 Gsus4 | Dm F2 | C |]
Verse 1: Your [C]beauty and Your [G]majesty Are a [Am]wonder to be[F]hold [C] [ ]I [G]stand in awe of [Am F]You Your [C]wisdom is to [G]me Worth more than [Am]silver or [F]gold [C] [ ]I [G]seek after [Am F]You There can [Dm]be no [C/E]greater [F]love Than the [Dm]one shown to [C/E]us by Your [F]Son
Chorus: And I[Dm] will al[F]ways b[C G]e In l[Dm G]ove [ ]with [C G]You And I[Dm] will al[F]ways b[C G]e In l[Dm F]ove with [C]You
Verse 2: Your [C]grace is sweeter [G]Than the sweetest [Am]tastes of this [F]world [C] [ ]I [G]thirst after [| Am C/E F |]You Your [C]gospel is the [G]truth ‘Round which my [Am]life re[F]volves [C] [ ]My [G]hope is in [Am C/E F]You There can [Dm]be no [C/E]greater [F]love Than the [Dm]one shown to [C/E]us by Your [F]Son
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 your beauty and your majesty are a wonder to behold i stand in awe of you your wisdom is to me worth more than silver or gold i seek after you there can be no greater love than the one shown to us by your son chorus and i will always be in love with you and i will always be in love with you verse 2 your grace is sweeter than the sweetest tastes of this world i thirst after you your gospel is the truth round which my life revolves my hope is in you there can be no greater love than the one shown to us by your son
